channel.title: Site of Visveswaran Vaidyanathan a.k.a StaticVish
channel.description: Recent content on Site of Visveswaran Vaidyanathan a.k.a StaticVish

item.title: About me
item.description: With over 20 years of experience in tech, Visveswaran is passionate about helping organisations apply SOLID, Lean, Agile, DevOps & SRE principles to achieve meaningful and tangible digital transformation. Having led teams large and small in diverse areas such as Core Banking, RegTech, GovTech , FinTech and Reliability Engineering, Visveswaran brings a wealth of knowledge and experience with a constant eye towards the big picture. Visveswaran holds a Masters degrees in IT and business management.
